test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity description/remark field becomes editable when gratuity amount is zero (or verify current disabled state and document as bug)
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify EOS transaction can be edited (gratuity and leave encashment amounts modified) and resubmitted without 'something went wrong' error
test_cases.expected_ui_behavior: Verify EOS transaction editing and submission
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify End of Services tab is hidden for offboarded employees and visible for active employees in employee profile
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity accrual report displays column headers and labels for 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount'
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify EOS gratuity calculation details are displayed in UI showing calculation breakdown and formula applied
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify EOS transaction form can be submitted for offboarded employees without 'Something went wrong' error; test form submission workflow
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that Final Settlement Amount field is visible and displays correctly on EOS calculation screen; check that UI clearly shows how deductions are applied to total
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity cap calculation field in accrual report displays and is based on Gross salary (not Basic salary only)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify month labels are clearly displayed on gratuity file download interface and employee profile to prevent confusion between months
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity file export has correct column header alignment with data content (e.g., 'hire date' column displays hire dates, not team lead names)
Verify date picker allows selection of previous/historical dates for gratuity liability export report generation
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify Gratuity Report downloaded from Payroll displays all required information fields, supports customization options, and provides flexible filtering mechanisms
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify Employee ID and Office columns are present in downloaded Gratuity export file
Verify gratuity liability report total sum calculation excludes non-numeric columns (e.g., Tenure in Years column not included in sum)
Verify Gratuity field is available in custom payroll report template dropdown and displays correctly in downloaded report
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify payroll accrual reports (Air Ticket Allowance, Gratuity Accrual, Leave Salary Accrual) are accessible for multiple closed payroll cycles, not just the most recent
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message appears when submitting EOS transaction; check error message text and visibility
Verify gratuity description text displayed in EOS form; check if country-specific text is shown for Qatar clients
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

task_flows.flow_name: Process End of Service for Single Employee
steps: Locate and select employee from table
Enter departure date in date picker
Add or modify deductions if needed
System automatically calculates gratuity amount based on MOHRE law
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate gratuity for an individual employee

steps: Input Computation Date for gratuity calculation
Review exported gratuity data for all employees
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate your total gratuity liability for all employees

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS transaction processing and error handling
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify End of Service transactions can be created, edited (gratuity/leave encashment amounts modified), and submitted successfully without generic error messages; confirm error handling provides descriptive feedback
Verify EOS calculation results display correctly in UI for various scenarios (leap years, mid-month departures, unpaid leave); note: actual calculation accuracy requires backend testing
Verify EOS calculation details and report columns are clearly labeled and visible in the UI with proper explanations

All tickets involve backend gratuity calculation discrepancies (leap year handling, contract type logic, labor law compliance, formula accuracy) - not testable with Playwright as they require verification of mathematical correctness
Both tickets involve gratuity accrual report calculation accuracy and data consistency - not testable with Playwright as they require backend calculation verification
Both tickets involve backend logic for document generation and deduction tracking - not testable with Playwright as they require verification of calculation logic and document content accuracy
Verify gratuity file export interface displays clear month labels and maintains correct column header-to-data alignment when downloading gratuity files
Verify gratuity export files and custom payroll reports include correct columns, calculate totals accurately, and display gratuity data for applicable employees
Cannot test - all are backend calculation issues involving gratuity formula, service duration, and unpaid leave handling
Cannot test - both involve backend data synchronization and file generation logic across system modules

not_testable_tickets.summary: BE: Rename existing "Leave Encashments" labels to "Leave Encashments for End of Service"
not_testable_tickets.reason: Won't Do status - ticket cancelled, no implementation to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Calculation of Leave Encashment in EOS
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - no implementation to test; also involves backend calculation logic verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't change the hiring date of the employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - no implementation to test; involves system constraint validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't request end of service of an employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed, nothing to test now
Closed status - feature request already resolved; involves backend report generation and data consolidation
Closed status - support ticket already resolved; involves backend leave accrual calculation logic
Closed status - calculation dispute already resolved; involves backend date arithmetic and calculation verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service giving error: Something went wrong
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed; involves backend error handling and calculation engine
Requires backend calculation verification for leap year adjustments; Playwright cannot validate mathematical accuracy of date calculations

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service pro rated amount isssue
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is Resolved; bug is already fixed. Cannot test a resolved issue
Status is Resolved; feature request for self-service reopen mechanism is already implemented or closed
Requires backend calculation verification comparing system tenure against MOHRE records; Playwright cannot validate calculation accuracy
Status is Cancelled; ticket was cancelled and no longer requires testing
Requires backend calculation verification for mid-month departures and unpaid leave adjustments; Playwright cannot validate mathematical accuracy
Resolved bug - calculation discrepancy between system and manual calculation is a backend logic issue; cannot verify correctness of mathematical formula with Playwright
Resolved bug - involves backend logic for document generation differentiation; Playwright can only verify UI elements exist, not the correctness of document content

not_testable_tickets.summary: GOSI Calculated in EOS while it is already submitted
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - involves backend calculation logic and deduction tracking; cannot verify mathematical correctness or database state with Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity Accrual report - calculation of closing/opening balance and new hire
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - involves backend calculation logic for report values; Playwright can verify report UI exists but not calculation accuracy
Closed bug - involves backend recalculation logic and data consistency; cannot verify database accuracy or dynamic calculation behavior

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity amount not considering leap year days
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - involves backend calculation logic for date handling; cannot verify mathematical correctness of gratuity formula
Resolved bug - involves backend calculation logic alignment with UAE Labor Law; cannot verify formula correctness with Playwright
Resolved support ticket - involves backend calculation methodology verification against labor law; cannot test mathematical accuracy
Resolved support ticket - involves backend calculation logic for leap year handling; cannot verify formula correctness
Backend calculation logic for prorated leave accrual during partial month offboarding; cannot verify mathematical correctness with Playwright
Backend gratuity calculation logic verification; cannot validate mathematical accuracy or partial year calculations with Playwright
Backend calculation logic for limited contract employees; cannot verify mathematical correctness of gratuity amounts with Playwright
Configuration problem requiring backend salary setup verification; cannot test system configuration prerequisites with Playwright
Backend calculation logic differentiation between termination and resignation scenarios per UAE law; cannot verify mathematical logic with Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: Hiring date needs to be updated
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend data consistency issue - requires database verification and payroll transaction history validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: Incorrect days worked in gratuity calculation
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation bug - requires verification of mathematical formula (Basic Salary / 30) and days worked count accuracy
Backend calculation logic - requires verification of inclusive date calculation methodology and comparison with external calculators

not_testable_tickets.summary: Investigate EOS pro rated mid month pay behavior for deduction
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend payroll calculation - requires verification of pro-rated salary deduction formula for mid-month departures
Backend calculation bug - requires verification of month-counting logic and leave days formula accuracy
Feature request cancelled - no current implementation to test
Backend calculation issue - system splitting SIF file generation based on arrears logic; cannot verify file generation or backend splitting logic with Playwright
Data inconsistency across backend modules - requires database verification and cross-system data synchronization checks; Playwright cannot verify data accuracy across different system views
Documentation/help article clarification request - not a testable UI bug; resolved as documentation update

not_testable_tickets.summary: Urgent : EOS Gratuity calculation Error / Bug
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation logic issue - gratuity amount computation based on departure reason; cannot verify mathematical correctness of calculations with Playwright
Backend calculation issue - unpaid leave days handling in gratuity formula; cannot verify calculation accuracy or leave exclusion logic with Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: Wrong Total Service duration in End of Service
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation issue - service duration calculation logic with unpaid leave handling; cannot verify calculation correctness with Playwright

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
